intro: Phrygilanthus mutabilis, commonly known as the variable phrygilanthus, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes many species with milky sap and showy flowers. Due to its unique floral characteristics and ecological role, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
